name: Monarch Sidebar Minimized on Mobile
author: Tomáš Groulík

sections.description:
The plugin adjusts the behavior of the Monarch plugin (elegantthemes) for cell phones. It sets the initial state of the social share sidebar as a nice minimized button (instead of the annoying sticky bottom bar with the text Share This).

LIGHT-WEIGHT PLUGIN
NO CONFIGURATION

Wanna check our other plugins?
Contact us for Support
Donation helps to keep improving and updating
sections.installation:
1. Download and install the plugin from WordPress dashboard.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.2.5

  • COMPATIBILITY CHECK – wordpress 6.0 compatibility check

1.2.4

  • BUGFIX – missing bottom margin in promo notice

1.2.3

  • BUGFIX – js map files was not included (warning in dev console)

1.2.2

  • COMPATIBILITY CHECK – wordpress 5.7 compatibility check

1.2.1

  • COMPATIBILITY CHECK – wordpress 5.6 compatibility check (jQuery update)

1.2.0

  • BUGFIX – plugin’s dependencies prefixed to not interact with other plugins

1.1.2

  • BUGFIX – wpackio 3rd site script loader interacting with other plugins that use wpackio
  • BUGFIX – prefix plugin’s dependencies to avoid interaction with other plugins

1.1.0

  • NEW FEATURE – Add promo admin features
  • Compatibility check with 5.4

1.0.4

  • TWEAK – Re-branding to DeepPresentation

1.0.3

  • BUGFIX – critical bug fix … wp-admin/includes/plugin.php was not included

1.0.2

  • BUGFIX – Fix mobile share button height – Monarch plugin still override and set incorrect height.
  • TWEAK – Include scripts just in case of activated Monarch plugin

1.0.1

  • BUGFIX – Fix mobile share button height – (in some themes or interaction with performance plugin height was not correctly calculated).

1.0.0

  • Initial version.
